song_name: Torn from the Heavens (Final Fantasy XIV)
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Torn from the Heavens (Final Fantasy XIV) is significantly more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Torn from the Heavens (Final Fantasy XIV) has sections analyzed in the following keys: C Minor,  and A Lydian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
